dialogue_history.content:
Analyze this financial news and estimate stock price movement probabilities.
Company: Apple Inc. (AAPL)
News Headline: These 5 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks Make Up 28.8% of the Entire S&P 500 Index
News Content: These 5 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks Make Up 28.8% of the Entire S&P 500 Index

Next I will provide you some predictions of stock price movement probabilities by others in the previous rounds.
Note that others' predictions may indicate that they have some other information about the stock price. A high prediction may indicate that they have some positive information about the stock, while a low prediction may indicate that they have some megative information about the stock.
Also note that there are multiple rounds of precitions, demonstrating the trend of others' beliefs.
Please take these information into consideration when prediction the stock price movement probabilities.
Previous predictions:
Round: 0
Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.65, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.35
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.5, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.5
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.52, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.48
Model: deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.5, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.5
Model: meta-llama/llama-4-scout, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.55, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.45
Model: meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.7, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.3
Model: qwen/qwen-turbo, Prediction of stock price rising: -1, Prediction of stock price falling: -1


Now give your prediction about the probability of the stock price of the relevant company rising or falling. Format your response in JSON format and include the following information as follows: 
{ 
"reasoning": "[Summarize your analysis and reasoning process here]", 
"company_name": "[Company Name indicating the name of the company]", 
"company_symbol": "[Company Symbol indicating the stock symbol of the company]", 
"news_headline": "[News Headline indicating the provided financial news headline]", 
"probability_of_stock_price_rise": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will rise due to this news], 
"probability_of_stock_price_fall": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will fall due to this news], 
} 
Do not generate output that isn't in properly formatted JSON.

```json
{
  "reasoning": "The news headline suggests that Apple Inc. (AAPL) is a significant player in the AI sector, given that it is one of the five stocks making up a substantial portion of the S&P 500 Index's AI influence. This information, combined with the previous predictions from various models, indicates a generally positive sentiment towards AAPL stock. Most predictions have a stock price rising probability greater than 0.5, with one exception being a model that predicted equal chances of rising or falling. The highest prediction of stock price rising was 0.7, and the lowest was 0.5. Given that AAPL is a major player in AI through its products and services like Siri, Core ML, and its ongoing research in AI, the overall positive sentiment seems to outweigh the negative. The news that AI stocks make up a significant portion of the S&P 500 index implies that AAPL, being a leading tech company heavily involved in AI, could see a positive impact on its stock price.",
  "company_name": "Apple Inc.",
  "company_symbol": "AAPL",
  "news_headline": "These 5 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks Make Up 28.8% of the Entire S&P 500 Index",
  "probability_of_stock_price_rise": 0.57,
  "probability_of_stock_price_fall": 0.43
}
```
